original: A little mod that adds a UPS-powered variant to the thermal electric suit and outfit.
translation: 一个小MOD，给电热连身衣和电热套装增加了一个UPS供电改装件。
context:
ID: thermal_ups
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/thermal_ups/modinfo.json
类型为 MOD_INFO

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#thermal_ups→MOD_INFO→thermal_ups
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=thermal_ups

ID: thermal_ups
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/thermal_ups/modinfo.json

original: This is a full-body suit of thin thermal underwear equipped with UPS-powered heating elements. It is warmer than its battery-powered counterpart. It is currently on, and continually draining UPS power.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 这是一套配有UPS电源加热元件的薄保暖内衣的全身套装。它比电池供电的同类产品更暖和。它当前处于打开状态，并不断消耗UPS电量。激活以关闭。
context:
ID: thermal_suit_ups_on
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/thermal_ups/tups_tool_armor.json
类型为 TOOL_ARMOR

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#thermal_ups→TOOL_ARMOR→thermal_suit_ups_on
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=thermal_suit_ups_on

original: This is a full-body suit of thin thermal underwear equipped with internal UPS-powered heating elements. It is warmer than its battery-powered counterpart. Use it to turn it on.
translation: 这是一套配有内部UPS供电加热元件的薄保暖内衣的全身套装。它比电池供电的同类产品更暖和。激活以打开。
context:
ID: thermal_suit_ups
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/thermal_ups/tups_tool_armor.json
类型为 TOOL_ARMOR

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#thermal_ups→TOOL_ARMOR→thermal_suit_ups
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=thermal_suit_ups

original: This suit of thin thermal underwear covers you from head to toe and is equipped with internal UPS-powered heating elements. It is warmer than its battery-powered counterpart.  It is currently on, and continually draining UPS power.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 这套薄薄的保暖内衣从头到脚覆盖你，并配有内部UPS供电的加热元件。它比电池供电的同类产品更暖和。它当前处于打开状态，并不断消耗UPS电源。激活以关闭。

类型为 TOOL_ARMOR
